derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Anglo-Norman French rebuter (from Old French rebut 'a reproach, rebuke')  + -al

means.word_mean: 1. a debater who refutes or disproves by offering contrary evidence or argument
2. (law) a pleading by the defendant in reply to a plaintiff's surrejoinder
